name: DailyCaller Dark, Green, No Ads
description: This style removes ads, and expands the visible area, removes the right column on the main page, and makes the articles easier to read without the mid-article ads. Dark background to reduce eye strain.
additional_info: 20151201 * Comment colors more visible (disqus.com) 20150910 * Gradient background * Colored header search icon * Dark large post boxes * Light small post boxes * Nav top bar black background * border radius on input search * Recolor visited links * Hide more ads / sponsored * Author name recolor 20150902 * Initial release * Fixed image sizes, no longer "squashed" * continued color changes
